trans-unit.source: Specifies that serializers should handle default values.
trans-unit.target: 指定序列化程式應處理預設值。

trans-unit.source: This means that instead of serializing only values that differ from an object's default values, all values are serialized, allowing values to be reset to their defaults for objects that may have already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，而非序列化物件的預設值不同的值，所有值都會加以都序列化，允許重設為其預設值可能已初始化的物件值。

trans-unit.source: When a component serialization service wishes to indicate this behavior to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer> objects, it will place a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext> object on the context stack.
trans-unit.target: 元件序列化服務希望表示此行為，以<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>物件，它會將<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext>內容堆疊上的物件。

trans-unit.source: The member in this context may be `null`, to indicate that all members are serialized, or it can indicate that only a specific member is being serialized at this time.
trans-unit.target: 在此內容中的成員可能`null`，以表示已序列化的所有成員，或可能表示在此階段都序列化特定成員。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Using the default constructor indicates that this context should be used for all members.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設建構函式，以指出此內容適用於所有成員。

trans-unit.source: The member to which this context is bound.
trans-unit.target: 這個內容繫結至的成員。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext" /> class with the option of binding to a specific member.
trans-unit.target: 使用繫結至特定成員的選項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If `member` is `null`, this context will be used for all members.
trans-unit.target: 如果`member`是`null`，將使用此內容的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the member to which this context is bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個內容繫結至的成員。

trans-unit.source: The member to which this context is bound, or <see langword="null" /> if the context is bound to all members of an object.
trans-unit.target: 這個內容繫結至的成員，或 <see langword="null" /> (如果內容繫結至物件的所有成員)。

trans-unit.source: The member to be examined for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查以進行序列化的成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the given member should be serialized in this context.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在這個內容中序列化指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the given member should be serialized in this context; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應在這個內容中序列化指定的成員，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
